div.main: Cisco UI Kit Home Design Primitives Components Layout Utilities Start Typing for Results

div.data-description: Switch elements are stacked by default. Add the form modifier form-group--inline to inline them.
Switch Labels can be placed left, right, or on both sides of the switch element.
Due to the new switch style, we were unable to embed icons into the actual switch like the previous version. Instead, we hide the actual switch and only render the icons.
Wrap your switch elements in a form-group to control spacing between other form group elements. This applies to both inline and stacked switch elements.
Switches are only allowed on the following panels.
By default all rows are striped for better visibility. Add the class table--nostripes to remove row striping.
Add the class table--selectable to enable row selection. Add the class active to the selected row.
Add the class table--highlight to add a row hover effect. You can also add the class sortable to a column header to indicate active sort.
Add the class table--hover to add a simple row hover effect.
Add the class table--fixed to change the table layout to fixed. A fixed table layout renders quicker than non-fixed but column widths are not determined by the data. By default tables are NOT fixed.
Add the class table--wrap to wrap text in the cells. By default, text is not wrapped.
Global modifiers you add to your body tag to modify behavior or spacing globally.
Use nudges to add extra margin (or padding) to your elements. Nudges are built off of the base spacing (20px) value so half-margin-left is equivalent to margin left 10px.
To disable any element, you can add a disabled attribute or the class disabled.
Add the class .blurred to add a blur effect.
Use the class pull-left or pull-right to float elements.
Set the opacity of any element using these helper classes.
Rotate any element using these helper classes.

blockquote.p: "Perfect typography is the most elusive of all arts."
"Everything should be made as simple as possible, but not simpler."
"Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life."
"Good people do not need laws to tell them to act responsibly, while bad people will find a way around the laws."
"When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us."
"Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly."
"Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people."

div.class: markup-code panel panel--bordered panel--ltgray panel--well hide qtr-margin-top

pre.code:
"Perfect typography is the most elusive of all arts."

Jan Tschichold

"Everything should be made as simple as possible, but not simpler."

Albert Einstein

"Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life."

Mark Twain

"Good people do not need laws to tell them to act responsibly, while bad people will find a way around the laws."

Plato

"When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us."

Helen Keller

"Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly."

John F. Kennedy

"Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people."

Eleanor Roosevelt

blockquote.p: "I have come to believe that the whole world is an enigma, a harmless enigma that is made terrible by our own mad attempt to interpret it as though it had an underlying truth."
"Be nice to people on your way up because you meet them on your way down."
"In science one tries to tell people, in such a way as to be understood by everyone, something that no one ever knew before. But in poetry, it's the exact opposite."

"I have come to believe that the whole world is an enigma, a harmless enigma that is made terrible by our own mad attempt to interpret it as though it had an underlying truth."

Umberto Eco

"Be nice to people on your way up because you meet them on your way down."

Jimmy Durante

"In science one tries to tell people, in such a way as to be understood by everyone, something that no one ever knew before. But in poetry, it's the exact opposite."

Paul Dirac

blockquote.p: "There is a wisdom of the head, and a wisdom of the heart."
"You are remembered for the rules you break."
"Weeds are flowers too, once you get to know them."

div.blockquote: Use positive and active wording for checkbox labels, so that its perfectly clear what will happen if the user turns on the checkbox. Avoid negations such as Dont send me notifications which would mean that the user would have to check the box in order for something not to happen.

By default, checkbox labels are wrapped. You can prevent wrapping by adding the modifier checkbox--nowrap. We recommend that you set the checkbox title attribute to the full label text when wrapping is disabled.

div.blockquote:
For a binary choice, the main difference between a switch and a checkbox is that the checkbox is for status and the switch is for action.
In the example below, the use of a switch is more clear than the use of a checkbox to turn the WiFi on.

div.class: markup-code panel panel--bordered panel--ltgray panel--well hide qtr-margin-top

pre.code:
Be Positive

Use positive and active wording for checkbox labels, so that its perfectly clear what will happen if the user turns on the checkbox. Avoid negations such as Dont send me notifications which would mean that the user would have to check the box in order for something not to happen.

Label Wrapping

By default, checkbox labels are wrapped. You can prevent wrapping by adding the modifier checkbox--nowrap. We recommend that you set the checkbox title attribute to the full label text when wrapping is disabled.

Switch versus Checkbox

For a binary choice, the main difference between a switch and a checkbox is that the checkbox is for status and the switch is for action.

In the example below, the use of a switch is more clear than the use of a checkbox to turn the WiFi on.
WiFi

div.h4: Cisco WAP571E Premium Dual Radio Outdoor Access Point
div.p: Don't let outdoor challenges inhibit your wireless connectivity. The Cisco WAP571E access point is purpose-built to meet the demands of your outdoor spaces. It offers a rugged housing (IP66 rated), and works even in rain, snow, and extreme high and low temperatures.

div.h6: Powered by intent. Informed by context. Growing more intuitive every day.

div.class: markup-code panel panel--bordered panel--ltgray panel--well hide qtr-margin-top

pre.code:
Cisco Aironet 1540 Series

Cisco WAP571E Premium Dual Radio Outdoor Access Point

Don't let outdoor challenges inhibit your wireless connectivity. The Cisco WAP571E access point is purpose-built to meet the demands of your outdoor spaces. It offers a rugged housing (IP66 rated), and works even in rain, snow, and extreme high and low temperatures.


THE NETWORK. INTUITIVE.

Powered by intent. Informed by context. Growing more intuitive every day.

div.blockquote:
We are introducing a new form group modifier to style inputs in a more simplified and flexible manner. Use form-group--error to indicate validation failure.
In this release we no longer automatically add the asterisk ('*') for required fields. Use the example below to see how to manually denote a required field.

div.blockquote:
You should list the options in a logical order, such as most likely to be selected to least, simplest operation to most complex, or least risk to most. Alphabetical ordering is not recommended because it is language dependent and therefore not localizable.
Also make sure to offer a default selection. Radio buttons should always have one option pre-selected.

div.class: markup-code panel panel--bordered panel--ltgray panel--well hide qtr-margin-top

pre.code:
Option Ordering

You should list the options in a logical order, such as most likely to be selected to least, simplest operation to most complex, or least risk to most. Alphabetical ordering is not recommended because it is language dependent and therefore not localizable.

Also make sure to offer a default selection. Radio buttons should always have one option pre-selected.

Dynamic Channel Assignment

div.p: Add the class active to the styled select form-group to toggle display of the dropdown menu.
